index.about: The Illinois Digital Heritage Hub is a collaboration between Illinois State Library, the Consortium of Academic and Research Libraries in Illinois, Chicago Public Library, and the University of Illinois at Urbana-Champaign.
index.description: Metadata guidelines and best practices created for the Illinois Digital Heritage Hub.
